original_text: those who managed to avoid the deconstructionist theorizing of french philosopher jacques derrida in college can now take an 85-minute brush-up course with the documentary derrida . or , you can do something fun tonight .
generated_text:
1. "if you're still trying to wrap your head around the complexities of quantum physics, here's a 2-hour primer. or, you can watch a rom-com instead."
2. "for those who struggled to stay awake during their intro to sociology course, here's a 90-minute refresher. or, you can play a game of solitaire."
